Support

Support for the ObjexxFCL can be obtained by telephone or email as shown below.

Support Contact Information
 

Tel
 1.781.455.1150     USA Eastern Time (UTC-5) 09:00-17:00
Email
 support@objexx.com

 

 


Support Services

Technical support includes resolution of installation and basic usage problems. Support terms are specified in the applicable support agreement.

Objexx Engineering provides support and development services to cover requirements that are beyond the scope of technical support. Visit the Objexx website for information on these services.
